lesson: Modals and Subjunctive Forms in Context

example.en: You should review your notes before the exam.
example.ar: ينبغي أن تراجع ملاحظاتك قبل الامتحان.

example.en: You could ask for help if needed.
I would travel more if I had more money.
example.ar: كنت سأسافر أكثر لو كان لدي المزيد من المال.

words.definition: A verb form used to express wishes or hypothetical scenarios.
words.arabic_definition: صيغة تستخدم للتعبير عن الأمنيات أو الاحتمالات.

example.en: I recommend that she be present.
He demands that the results be announced soon.
example.ar: يطالب بأن يتم الإعلان عن النتائج قريبًا.

words.definition: To state firmly that something must be done.

example.en: They insist that the agreement be signed.

words.definition: To suggest that something is a good idea.
words.arabic_definition: اقتراح شيء على أنه فكرة جيدة.

example.en: I recommend that you review the documents.

words.definition: To put forth an idea for consideration.

example.en: He proposed that we reschedule the meeting.

words.definition: To mention an idea for consideration.

example.en: I suggest that we review the budget.
